title: Advanced Simulation-Based Training Program for Obstetrics and Gynecology

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced learners participating in real-time simulation training using digital devices, strengthening team-based collaboration and technical proficiency

learning_goals: Participants can handle high-risk obstetric simulation scenarios with 90% accuracy.

Participants achieve over 30% skill improvement compared to baseline knowledge through obstetric simulation training.

resources: Real-Time Video Recording and Feedback System

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
